接口的使用
org.apache.catalina.Service

  • 使用Service的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina  
    org.apache.catalina.connector  
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.mbeans  
    org.apache.catalina.startup  

    • org.apache.catalina中Service的使用

      返回Service的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Service Server.findService(java.lang.String name)
      Return the specified Service (if it exists); otherwise return null.
      Service[] Server.findServices()
      Return the set of Services defined within this Server.
      Service Engine.getService()
      Return the Service with which we are associated (if any).
      参数类型为Service的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Server.addService(Service service)
      Add a new Service to the set of defined Services.
      void Server.removeService(Service service)
      Remove the specified Service from the set associated from this Server.
      void Engine.setService(Service service)
      Set the Service with which we are associated (if any).

    • org.apache.catalina.connector中Service的使用

      声明为Service的org.apache.catalina.connector中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected Service Connector.service
      The Service we are associated with (if any).
      返回Service的org.apache.catalina.connector中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Service Connector.getService()
      Return the Service with which we are associated (if any).
      参数类型为Service的org.apache.catalina.connector中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Connector.setService(Service service)
      Set the Service with which we are associated (if any).

    • org.apache.catalina.core中Service的使用

      实现Service的org.apache.catalina.core中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  StandardService
      Standard implementation of the Service interface.
      返回Service的org.apache.catalina.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Service StandardServer.findService(java.lang.String name)
      Return the specified Service (if it exists); otherwise return null.
      Service[] StandardServer.findServices()
      Return the set of Services defined within this Server.
      Service StandardEngine.getService()
      Return the Service with which we are associated (if any).
      参数类型为Service的org.apache.catalina.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void StandardServer.addService(Service service)
      Add a new Service to the set of defined Services.
      void StandardServer.removeService(Service service)
      Remove the specified Service from the set associated from this Server.
      void StandardEngine.setService(Service service)
      Set the Service with which we are associated (if any).

    • org.apache.catalina.mbeans中Service的使用

      参数类型为Service的org.apache.catalina.mbeans中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String MBeanUtils.getDomain(Service service)
      已过时。 
      To be removed since to creates a circular dependency. Will be replaced in Tomcat 8 by a new method on Service.

    • org.apache.catalina.startup中Service的使用

      实现Service的org.apache.catalina.startup中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  Embedded
      已过时。 
      Use Tomcat instead.
      声明为Service的org.apache.catalina.startup中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected Service Tomcat.service 
      返回Service的org.apache.catalina.startup中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Service Tomcat.getService()
      Get the service object.
